lines.name: SAM
lines.text: In America we bastardize it as Loot Crate, but history has never been the same.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They're like "What the fuck!?" "Code not received."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's an ARG, I know it!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's perfect. They'll enter 'Tary' and be disappointed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hey, at least it's in character.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you, Sam. Appreciate it. All righty, so, a number of us, if the weather is with us-- as a giant storm apparently just blew into the west coast-- are intending to fly out tomorrow to Anime Milwaukee. So it'll be me and Marisha--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's gonna be cold. With Travis, Laura, myself, and Marisha will be out there along with a bunch of other awesome guests, so hopefully we'll see you guys there very soon. Also, as far as the merch goes, apparently we're out of dice! Right? We're out of dice. Dice are gone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We even ordered a lot this time, but we're out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But what will the people do? What will they roll?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, maybe they'll roll something extra special later. I don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You speak like you know what you're talking about.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What a tease. What a tease.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have Gilmore shirts. We have a few-- We have Strongjaw shirts! Are you wearing yours?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's our Critical Role logo shirt! All these shirts are still available in the store!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's wearing it on his face. That's Strongjaw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is Strong-- this is a strong jaw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No worries. Thank you, Laura. Marisha, do you want to talk about Signal Boost? I guess Amy Dallen just had her run, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's great. This week is Eric Campbell coming up in the run. And you should go-- (airhorn noises)-- and you should go watch 'em.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, where does that end? Once you stop-- once you pop you just don't stop-- oh god, now it's a Pringles reference. Okay, go watch Signal Boost!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Indeed. (In Scottish accent) And there's a new thing called Wednesday Club. You want to talk about that? What's that about, Taliesin? Tell us about that!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: For anybody who reads comic books normally, you know that Wednesdays is when comic books get released at comic book stores all across the country. And if you're a big comic book nerd-- and you had a really fun comic book store-- you would go on a Wednesday night and hang out with all the other comic book nerds and have six-week-long conversations on who would win in a fight, Superman or Thor.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Actually, funny enough. You don't go to a Wednesday Club, so you--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So now that I don't really have time to do that any more, we thought it would be fun to just do it here with all of our comic book nerds, so Amy Dallen and Matt Key and I are going to be talking comics every Wednesday from noon to two on the Twitch stream and we're going to--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: New show! The Wednesday Club, and we're going to try and make it fun to watch, and easy if you've not picked up a book in ages and you've maybe thought about getting into comics, or you had some kids and now the comic books have just turned into giant shreds of paper.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, it's not a news show.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're not talking news. We're just talking fun, cool comic book facts, and our first episode is going to be "Origin Stories" were we talk about why we got into comic books, and then starting the week after we're going to be talking about cool characters, team-ups, classic runs of books, anything and everything. It's going to be great.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Special guests! We will have special guests and not-so-special guests-- you can come, too. So yes! Wednesday Club, we'll be talking about comic books! It's going to be great!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Also, there's a game called For Honor that just came out that a couple of you assholes are in.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, it's on the shelves, we've been playing it for weeks here!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can play it as well if you go to your local shop or download it or get it at a store--I already said that but you can play samurais-- we have no samurais here. You can play knights-- Hey!-- or you can play Vikings-- you can use this guy!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What kind of Viking are you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It comes out Tuesday, February 14th on all gaming platforms.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Our Valentine's Day consisted of me making chili and then us going to Menchie's.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was a gooood Valentine's Day.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's good chili, to be fair.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got out of the house, though.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We watched Jurassic World and Suicide Squad.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We wanted to get caught up on our, like--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, we had to sit quietly for an hour afterward, just to take it all in.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My favorite is Rick Flag just shouting exposition through Suicide Squad and that's his purpose.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Including Katana's needless arrival-- Anyway! This is not this night's game of D&D.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I went to Underworld and met some Critters, it was good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh! That's a better Valentine's Day.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know, honestly, you two having the time to sit down and watch two bad movies--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: When I don't have time to watch one good movie--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Here we go. Here we go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: -- is offensive. That is offensive to me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You have the joy of children in your life!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's so thirsty! He's just dehydrated.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They'll be holding your hand, you know, in later years.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It will help me when I'm dying. That is true--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Pushing you slowly off the edge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We're just gonna be somewhere in a forest, lost, screaming to each other, Help! So that's our future.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I guess it's time to climb this mountain and throw myself off.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a good way to go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is my child. This's what I've accomplished.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Last but not least, quick little note, due to the current difficulties with green cards and people that are in the country who weren't born here, one of our fantastic crew members, Amandine, unfortunately is having to leave and go back to Switzerland. This is her last episode of Critical Role. She's been a tremendously amazing member of our team, and we've loved having her here, and we certainly know this is not the last we'll see of her, but this'll be her last show for awhile, so I just wanted to bring her out and say hi to the community real fast.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Aw, yeah! Come on out! (all applaud)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: -- and she could stay on the crew. Just a quick little marriage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We all tried, everyone here did our best, but we're going to miss you terribly and you've been amazing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know, you've been great, man.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's been working on Talks Machina, kicking ass.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, she's been kicking ass on set.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's why it looks good now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's bring the show to her!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, perfect! We're coming to Switzerland!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you made your way past the bazaar towards the inn, on the outside you saw what appeared to be a large humanoid structure built of iron and metal walking on its own behind a very flashily dressed blond gentleman with goatee and a, for lack of a better term, braggartly demeanor who managed to weasel his way into the company of Vox Machina and to continue his adventures alongside theirs as his robot friend Doty continued to archive it in his book of his adventures. And that is where we left off. As you guys step into the relatively empty interior of the Debt's Respite at this hour, with this individual Taryon Darrington in tow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We agreed to bring him along because he's paying us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a very important fact.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jumbo-- Tar-- I'm Tary. Can you spell out your name for me on a piece of parchment?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, no. I asked you to spell it out on a piece of parchment.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, you want me to write it down.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I'm, uh, I study handwriting.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I understand. A scholarly mind is not a thing to shirk. Doty, write out my name in the finest calligraphy and give him a page.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (writing noises) And the hand seems to pick up speed and start rapidly whipping across the page--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (tearing paper noise) Tears it out and presents it to you rather forcefully just over Taryon's head. And it is pretty fine calligraphy, actually. Not that you can appreciate it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It was nothing. I'm always looking out for this group, though. Thank you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you the leader of this collection of individuals? You are the biggest.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Our leader isn't with us right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hm. All right. Have we already begun our mission that we're on right now?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We just got here and then you started talking.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I assume we've got the table at this point.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, look at that. It looks like they all returned. It's not often you see folks who are at "least trying to stick to their word."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're trying to stick to our word at the very least.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Key word is 'try'. Mainly by avoiding death at this point.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh god, don't point to me, I forgot we were even here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or maybe, unless you meant to say me and you said Vax.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because why would Vax have anything, I'm the one with the bag of colding.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: See, actually, this is one of those instances where it sounded halfway between Vax and Vex--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was not, it was a "Vax."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It could work for either of us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I will definitely, I will stand behind that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure, it was like a long 'a' like a Vaaax.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was Vax, it was not a Vex.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, you will once my book comes out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just ignore him, really. How about that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're not entirely sure what happened here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ah, there's some fancy garb you're wearing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He leans forward. "So what? Are you here to talk--"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "-- or drink?  You here to talk?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shall we bust it out here or do you want to talk in private?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He does a quick scan of the room. "It's my people and you. Might as well."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should I dig into the bag of holding?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What? I don't even remember being here!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I'm just gonna reach in the bag of holding and pull out the hand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, and you do. You find the mechanical digits of Ripley, plus some of them partially bent from the combat--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I still don't have it, I'm trying to--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have the mechanical hand and the human hand.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We took both. We figured we'd have options, if I recall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's right, I put the regular hand-- did we?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We took both! We took the robot hand and the-- To be fair, I was dead at the time so I don't--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you fuck us, we take your hands.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You have more than one hand with you right now?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We have a lot of stuff in that bag.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We really don't know what's in there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You don't want to see in there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just tell me when to start swinging the sword.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thought you had to-- oh, yeah! And it extends, but--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you pass over the hand?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sniffs) "It's a strange contraption. Certainly looks like a hand."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're telling me, this is the one that took out the Mistress Asharru?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She used one of these devices.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Right, right. Very well." He takes the hand and begins scraping the pistol back with him as well.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The pistol was just for show. It wasn't a gift.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. Well, at least the Mistress can lay at rest. I thank you for your deed." And he spins his finger in the air and one of the men at the table gets up and walks out of the room and exits through the front door behind you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I won't pretend that we didn't have our own reasons for it. But we are grateful that you recognize that we respect your authority.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Takes some balls to come back here and not have anything to show for it. So, glad you got balls, all of you. Except for that one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Giant balls. Yeah, his I'm not sure of--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We haven't checked his, to be fair.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're free to wander without worry.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did we not get anything for that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We got someone to remove a debt upon our heads.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Could we see the debt or was it magic?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. Let the big guy play.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But I wanna keep an eye out on the bar because I still don't trust our environment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Certainly. It's been kinda low-key here for the day.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Then that's two for you. I'll have two of your strongest whatevers for blond-chin over there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Round it is." And he goes and he gathers up a number of small mugs, tankards, it's ramshackle in here. This essentially acts as a base of operations first and a tavern a distant second, so it's barely functional really as a comparable establishment for fine drinks and atmosphere, but it works.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, yeah. The drinks are passed around, some small talk's made with Treev, discussing just how things have been pretty low-key since Asharru was killed and you guys last left, there hasn't been an upset. There was apparently a vision of some sort of a creature at the top of the Cerulean Palace a few days ago.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But people were wondering if that was a sighting of Devo'ssa, and some of the rather intense historians and younger believers in the myth of Devo'ssa have been up in a tizzy, and Treev just kinda shrugs it off and takes a drink and goes, "Just what we need is another bigger fucking dragon."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not for a long time, one would hope.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have to admit, I'm curious, where did you get your friend there?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Really? What's his power? How's he powered? What runs him? I'm just sort of curious.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I-- no offense, but I doubt you would understand the inner workings of something as complicated as this.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a very interesting thought you have there. But, still, I would be just delighted to hear your attempt to simplify it for me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I will. Are you familiar with levers? Things that move up and down?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes? Some of those. There's also a machine called a pulley where you can apply force and it will amplify it with a wheel and a string.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think I've read about such things before, yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Some of those are in there. Also, an incline. It's another simple machine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You didn't build it, did you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did you? Did you build it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So, one would assume there's an access panel somewhere on him where one can make adjustments, or otherwise fix him if he breaks down?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you. Where would the access panel be?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why do you care to know?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, just in case you're knocked unconscious by, let's say, someone sneaking up behind you and hitting you with a weapon?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Won't happen. Doty has my back. Right, Doty?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point Doty crams in right behind and is dwarfing Tary in size with the broad metallic shoulders and is (heavy footfalls)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm a bit of a tinkerer. I can show you a few things if we have a quiet moment, not in public.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I look forward to the lesson.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I look forward to giving the lesson, yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm curious if we could uh, it was Ermergerd, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nope. You misheard me, Little Elf Boy, it's Taryon Darrington.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fucking don't like this guy. I'm curious, where do you hail from? Are you from here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I was like, "hmm, I don't know what any of those--"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Gloves of Missile Snaring are currently equipped, motherfucker!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's beautiful. Okay. Let me go look up the information that I emailed you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can also look it up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who is that guy and what is email?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are from the city of Diastock, in the Truscan Empire of Wildmount.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My family has quite a reputation there and I live on a vast compound with beautiful orchards and--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait! You're not related to the Briarwoods, are you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm sorry, no, I don't know them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He doesn't look like a Briarwood.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Have you ever heard the name Briarwood before?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have not, I'm sorry. Is Antlers okay over here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. She seems a bit drunk already or something.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So pampered, young, everything you could ever want--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I wouldn't say pampered. All right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Those were my words. Go on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I had a normal upbringing. Private tutors, classes--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kind of sounds like your upbringing, Percy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My family runs a very prosperous business, and yes, I have received some benefits from that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But I am a self-starter in my own mind and--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've gone out on my own to seek my fortune--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh God. The universe is collapsing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you purchase that armor all on your own as well, or did Mommy and Daddy buy it for you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I purchased it myself. With my money, that--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It belongs to me. It's my birthright.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Tary Jumbo, do you have a most dangerous conquest in that book? That Dotty has.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Doty. I have a list of adventures that I am currently going through.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Some of the adventures include: Rescue a maiden--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, this one I'm looking forward to! Solving a mysterious riddle.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The old fashioned double-cross. Teleport, haven't done that yet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Slay a dragon. And there's more, but the list is extensive and I'd like to conquer various beasts, rescue different people, find different treasures. It's going to be quite an adventure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You should just wipe it off the list right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's low on the list. It's a low one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can just erase it. You'll be fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's funny, that whole list... it seems like we've done all of it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh yes. How many dragons now?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Tary, do you feel like we look healthy and sane to you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's fine, you can be honest.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You seem healthy. You certainly are decked out in adventuring gear, which is quite attractive. Sanity I can't be a good judge of yet, I just met you. You seem like lovely creatures.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You and I are the same age.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's weird, you look older, but you act younger.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, that is strange. Youthful exuberance, I suppose.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So, what do you hope to accomplish at the end of completing all these tasks, you know, slaying a dragon? What do you want in the other end?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The other end will be my masterpiece, my book. Doty has been very, very good about taking down all of my adventures and exploits, and at the end of it all... I know we just met, but may I share with you some of my working titles?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Another round, I've got it, I've got it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Treev's already on it. Treev is like, "Oh, don't worry. I'm loving this." Then he's just pouring all of you glasses and shoving them forward to you guys and crossing his arms.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to keep an eye-- I'm keeping an eye out for any kind of questionable behavior.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, perception check. Go ahead.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a huge die you just rolled.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a newbie, it's a newbie.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Which is why it screwed you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Here's what I have so far.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought we already did, the Daring Adventures of--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That was a good one, but I have some other ones.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Terrific and Terrifying Tales of Daring Taryon Darrington--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Zen and the Art of Robot Manservant Repair.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel like that's been done.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I grab my sister by the arm, and I drag her off the the side. What-- Why are we doing this exactly? Why are we bringing him with us, exactly?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Keyleth just gets a nosebleed, and she's not sure why.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You think he can pay 50k an hour for realsies?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How much money do you have in your account right now?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I would not care to say. We're in a public place.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can whisper it in my ear.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispers) I would not care to say.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Here's what I need to know. Are you full of shit and you don't actually have any money, or do you have enough to pay our fee?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does this helmet look like it's something that didn't cost a shit ton of money?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It looks like it did, but for all I know you spent all your money on it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, well, if you don't want the money, we can break the contract right now, and I'll go my way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How about you just show me some money, and that way we can be sure.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I will. Come with me over to the corner.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's where the good stuff happens.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was a nice little Jerry Maguire there, especially considering the date. Very appropriate.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys have stepped away from the rest of the crowd, as you guys watch--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tary kind of puts his arm on her shoulder--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Leads her over to the corner.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll reach into my Bag of Holding

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And pull up just a handful of coin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A nice fistful of pristine platinum pieces in his grip.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just a whole bag of that? I want to look at one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't. Flick. Money at me. Dear. If you want to keep your hands.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make an investigation check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's not the cup of a carpenter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It has not seen a lot of antiquing across its surface, and most of the coin is branded in a way that emanates from the Truscan Empire. It does appear to have Wildmount origin.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Lovely. I believe you. Congratulations on being born into privilege.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, well, I didn't choose to be, and I am trying to lead my life honest and true, humble and brave, every day of my life. And I thank you for allowing me to travel with you, and perhaps go on a mission? I mean, is this mission going to start at some point?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was just completed, didn't you notice?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Mysterious, isn't it?  And I walk away.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's true, she's actually very correct.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey, hey. Remember when we were at Greyskull Keep, and we made all the guards, like, audition to be guards?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, that was quite a while ago.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What if we have an audition for Tary Jumbo?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not the most ridiculous thing I've ever heard.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I love it when I do that, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know, it's quite good. Let's finish up our business here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does anyone not understand, we had a mission here that we just completed?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We just did it! We completed it!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We were also going to go to the Cerulean Tower and have a quick conversation.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, no. We need to do that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We need to do that. But we did just finish a mission.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, we have to talk to--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I am not taking him to J'mon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know, I can stand outside with him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How about I audition him outside, while you go have your convo? Like, we make him beat somebody up or something.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Audition who? What are you talking about?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm saying we should, like, initiate Ole Tary J.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Like we did back at Greyskull.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If that's what the letter that second word starts with.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought you only learned Gs.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Our business concluded, we actually have some business at the Cerulean Tower, so we should all, perhaps, head there at this point.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I... not to be a pest, but--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, we're heading-- there will be adventure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And we also didn't offer access to every contact and person that we know on this globe, all right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We don't just chuck you in the furnace right away. We've got to temper you a bit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Besides, things just seem to happen around us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So if you just hang out long enough, I'm sure someone's gonna want to beat our ass over something.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like, most boring day ever now that Tary's here, we don't do anything fun at all.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We all sit down and start knitting.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So, yes. We would love to head in that direction.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want to live in that world!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would also like to, quietly on the headphone, I would really like to know where this machine comes from, because I'm finding it just a bit creepy, and I would love to get that information out of him before he disappears.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's roughly eight and a half feet tall.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So just a bit taller than me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A bit taller, yeah, I'd say a little larger than that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's kind of hunched forward as it walks, it probably could stand taller if it wanted to.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Was he kind of like, Fassbender size-ish, or?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's tall, but it's kind of lanky in its construction, and it seems to be thicker at the feet and the arms and fists, but the actual structure itself is proportionally pretty thin.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I faintly remember you talking about, you were talking to someone, I don't know who it was, but you were talking about plans you had for sort of a walking, automated something. Am I imagining that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It always just seemed so impractical. And now I'm looking at one, and I'm irritated.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Irritated? Or was inferior the word you were looking for?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: To be honest, you seem like you got your goolies burned there just from a conversation, a little bit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Brain drain him for all the knowledge you can!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we've already done that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think that was an oyster we've already supped upon.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm gonna flip on the cloak by the way, now that we are well out of that area.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is anyone following us from the Scarbearers?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The eye that you have been keeping out, you don't notice anyone giving chase or following you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know I don't know anything about that shit, but in my experience talent and skill have nothing to do with whether you're a douchenozzle or not. He seems like a schmuck.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (gasps) I think that's the first time I said douchenozzle.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah he called you 'little elf-girl and little elf-boy'. I don't like him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know my hair's shorter so it makes my antlers look bigger, which I was concerned about.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, they're very attractive I'm sure you heard---

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like your face more than your antlers, but both are nice, dear.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, you know what? Let's move off this conversation.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just wanted to ask Tary.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Duty. Got it. Does he fight or does he just write?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He does what I tell him to do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is he competent in a battle?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Has he ever been in battle?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Doty has been in a battle.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does he look like he has any battle scars?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Glancing over and getting a quick look-- make a perception check actually.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Roll your new dice to redeem it for that shit--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No no no, at least it's not a one. 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks like it's seen some scuffles in it's time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Old, far older than your armor.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That may be because in battle I am deft, fearless.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No deft, with a T. I can dodge blows uncannily. I can anticipate what my opponent is going to do ahead of time and dodge out of the way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can see that about you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. Did Doty raise you? Is he like your nanny?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, he's a mechanical construct that I made, he did not--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That you made when you were two? Because he looks like he raised you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Doty did not raise me. He is a mechanical construct that I built when I learned how.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How old were you when you built him?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And he only talks to you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nope. He doesn't talk to me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, he only listens to you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's the best really. Fearless, strong, big, and excellent penmanship. He's everything I could hope for in a friend. Silent.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Were pen pals a thing for you? Is that why you like penmanship?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, no. I don't think I ever had a penpal.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No? Did you have any friends? Ever?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: --wonderful. No, no! Don't 'aww'. They were wonderfully smart and engaging, but my best friends were the books I read.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What were Mom and Dad like?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They are wonderful people my father--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean when you were a tyke.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My mother is... a saint; she's perfect in every way. She's a wonderful person and... yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Really? And they're still alive? Weren't killed in some crazy raid, or... eaten by dragons or...fell in a pit of lava?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, they are eagerly awaiting me to arrive back at home and tell them tales of my journeys and adventures.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A businessman? Is that a taboo subject with you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No! Not at all. It's just, I'm not sure how well versed you are in financial transactions.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, fuck-all. I thought you could give me the layman's terms.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He is in real estate. He buys and sells properties, charges rent, taxes...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He owns a lot of things, places and makes a lot of money off of these places.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have nothing to hide. I come from money; this is clear.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I insight check him on 'I have nothing'?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, it's not! Don't use luck!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will use luck if I want to use luck!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hard to read. For many reasons!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I also want to take a good long look at robot and see if I can-- this automaton.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you trying to ascertain about it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How old it is, how it was built, where it was built. Just to get a sense of it, like looking over a classic car.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Best that you can tell from its construction and your understanding, there is a lot of ingenuity in its design. But it is, it exists, and moves through a combination of decent engineering and enchantment.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh thank God! Okay, I feel better.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see very, very faint engravings of various runic glyphs that are similar some of the ones that you saw on--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. I feel better already, thank you. Ego restored.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm sorry. Do you have business at the palace?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I thought we got it back, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did he give back to us or did he not?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, no. Are we talking about the flute?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: TALIESIN:I think he still has the symbol, doesn't he?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have his flute because I picked it up last.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, that doesn't have his symbol on it though.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We do bring news though, so...

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We need to speak with him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vox Machina is here, he knows us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The guard takes the flute and--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I take it and I dust the ash and drug use off of it. And then--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Please to be patient, for just a moment."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I do not believe we have met, I'm sorry, what is your name?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've aided in closing a far too lingering chapter in the history of Marquet and the ruin of the Cinder King. Thank you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We wanted to make sure that they were aware that all of the dragons had been dealt with, and that the Conclave had been completely vanquished.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This information did make it to the ears of J'mon.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Excellent. And we thank you for your time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, could I take you aside for a moment?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course, my dear." And she walks alongside you as you pull her off a little bit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have in our service, in Emon, a wonderful man, who has been of great aid in battling the Conclave as well, and we learned recently that he was expelled from Marquet due to crimes in his youth and was wondering if we could maybe speak in his name and his regard, to you, to clear his name?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I can see what I can do. What is the name of this gentleman?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course she does, because she takes killer notes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I didn't know that he had a name!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. I will go and take this into the archives, discover and see what can be done.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you so much. If you find out anything, will you please send word?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, should we be sending it to Emon as well?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If you could, send it to Whitestone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We will find a way to do so.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's an up and coming city. Very prominent on Tal'dorei.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Would you send J'mon, would you send them our thanks?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I will do this. I apologize, J'mon is not currently taking audiences.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But I will continue to pass this word onto them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you very much. And good day! Be pleased.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the Grand Maven turns around and heads back up the stairs, the guards take their place and the palace is at rest.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Lots of travel happening. Happens when you travel, I hear.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's true, yeah. Anytime you fly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So I think that concludes this little jaunt, it might be back home now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, I think it's about time that we see what Tary Jumbo's worth.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: One of your things on your list, right, it was to get in a kerfuffle?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's no kerfuffle on the list--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: --but we are going to have an adventure, is that right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Buddy boy, you're buying in for shit you're not really ready for, yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So far, we've delivered a dead body part to someone, and had a brief conversation with a guard.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is this what you all are about?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And then we're gonna take you to hell.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's like seven or eleven of them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're taking this one to hell then?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Might be a good trial run.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know. Do you want to put him through his paces?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want to save traveling the Ozmit Sea and heading to the water Ashari for when Pike is back.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. Let's take this fucker to hell.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know what you're talking about.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, we're speaking insanely literally right now. That's what's impressive about it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And we're taking you with us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shouldn't we see him fight first?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, well, let's bring him home.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'd hate for him to die immediately.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, we want Grog to run him out like a labrador.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do I see any large, intimidating looking creatures just walking around where we are at the moment?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, not in the city, Grog.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He only has to listen to you at home.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Uh, best that you can tell here in the Sand Herald district, no. Most everyone who wanders around here are of noble dress or part of the Hand of Ord.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You see that fruit merchant over there?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, well maybe I should pay him to take me on an adventure because Jesus Christ. This is about as fucking boring as I can get.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I might just hit him. I might just attack him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey! You know what you can cross off your list? Teleportation, because that's what we're about to do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's on my list; it's literally on my list.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait what? All right, let's go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, all right, all right! Finally getting my money's worth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So we're going back to Whitestone?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, get your big boy pants on, Ermergerd.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, as you find a familiar tree you can utilize to transport over to Whitestone, Tary you watch as the center of this tree's trunk suddenly seems to split open with divine energy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On the opposite side, you watch this tunnel progress about four or five feet within where it just looks like the striations of the interior of the tree trunk before it emerges on the other side into another town square currently in the middle of an evening.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Doty, take this down. As the tree split in front of me--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you all tumble through the Transport via Plants spell, you all emerge on the opposite side of the Sun Tree in the center of Whitestone's courtyard. What do you wish to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh my. Oh my gods. Where are we? What's going on?  What happened? Where am I? Is this a fantasy world? What happened?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow! That was exhilarating! It's like my body fell apart and came back together again!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's exactly what it was like.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or it was like walking forward.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. I've never had that sensation ever before. Ever.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Today is the greatest day of Taryon Darrington's life. The day that he experienced the wonder of the gods. That's enough for now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god, did you guys hear that? He thinks I'm a god. Doucher!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Douchenozzle, that's right! That's what it was. Sorry, I'm just learning it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically now that I think about it, it would still be day, because you guys left in the morning to Ank'Harel, and you've been there for a few hours, so it's early afternoon at this point.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So we're back on home turf, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, we're going to take this guy to a field and kick his ass, or what are we going to do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I kind of want to.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, can I go find Jarett really fast?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's easy enough to find. You head down to where the makeshift garrison, which has now seen reconstruction, actually being turned into a decent functional garrison within the town itself. A lot of the guards are out there running through their drills for the afternoon, and you can see Jarrett is in the process of running them through what looks like ranged combat training. As you approach, Jarett looks over and watches you walking up from a distance and kind of gives a wave, "Hello!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I have to say, I am very glad to know that we "have no more dragons for quite some time." And you see he's recovering; he's healing, but there is noticeable scarring on the side of his neck. And it looks like he's going through the process of recovering from the Thordak battle, but he's doing much better than the last time you saw him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To be perfectly honest, very happy to not be anywhere near that terrible city. I never thought I had the sense for the slower parts of the countryside, but I don't know; I've come to like it here in Whitestone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It is quite nice. Well, you're welcome to stay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We are planning to rebuild our home in Emon as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So it's up to you where you'd like to be.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Really, you employ me so it is more up to you, but I kind of like the change in temperature.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, in case you're wondering, we just came from Marquet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where we spoke with the Grand Maven?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of J'mon Sa Ord. Spoke very highly of you and she's working on getting your name cleared.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, she said she would. I don't know what you did, dear, but hopefully it wasn't anything too terrible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He doesn't look nervous at all, he looks elated and is like, "Well, thank you. I hope that comes to a fruitful end. I've been living here long enough where it's "not a huge deal to me, but it would be nice to occasionally return--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course. And you may not have heard, but our resident bard has left us. Possibly for the time being, possibly for more. So you won't be seeing his face around here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I am sorry to hear that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I only tell you because I saw you speaking with him several times and thought you might want to know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That being the case, can I ask a favor of you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't feel comfortable holding on to this."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was requested by your small bard friend and I probably should not have it on my person.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is it? Components of a potion? I don't...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One that you should not probably drink.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's suude. It's illegal. You should not-- It is dangerous.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes! Yes it is! Let's talk about it in front of everyone I'm training! Yes, thank you!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I put it in my pocket.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't do drugs! Scanlan was doing drugs? Jarett, you sold Scanlan drugs?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, I procured them for him at his request.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is this why you were expelled from Marquet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are a number of reasons.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How long have you been providing this to him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This was only the second. I did not want to do this! He is a very convincing person and looked like he was going through a hard time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And look, I understand that, and I warned him. He knew full well the dangers involved; he's a much stronger man than I am. Who was I to tell him this? And he's very persuasive.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He is. When was the first time you gave it to him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not more than maybe a week or two ago?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you. Thank you for giving them to me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And I don't want to hold onto it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The rest of you, as you walk through Whitestone, Taryon, you watch this beautiful, wonderfully slightly backwards city--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah! And there's a castle. They have a castle!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We do quite well... in the on season.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you mind if you come to the outskirts of the city with us?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I literally know nothing about this city.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Great, yeah, come with us. Just Vax knows the way, Vax will you... You know? The spot?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The beautiful parts of the city, actually, are the countryside, the woods around. It's drab in the middle.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And adventure you shall have, my friend.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So can we find our way to like a fairly open and not populated part of Whitestone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Your best bet, at this point, would be to make your way to the unclaimed gardens in the back of the castle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are guards around and it is away from the general populace of Whitestone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Now, if you want your first taste of adventure, you need to bring Dottie and come over here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have to whisper it because it's very secret.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Four-eyes, shall I trust Jumbo here because he seems a bit shady.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, no, you should trust him with your life. He's very trustworthy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will roll an insight check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Grog and I are just waiting.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do I add to it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yeah, that. I have forgotten how to play Dungeons and Dragons. 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Travis, I would like you to roll a deception.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wait, is it Travis or is it me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's kind of both of you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So Percy at advantage then, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You can trust Grog for some things.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Plus I do want to take him on an adventure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like Grog is getting far more trustworthy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get the sense that maybe not all the information is there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not a lie, but it's definitely-- it speaks of a half truth.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Doty. He's right behind me, as he always is.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice. So put out your hand like this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And take your other hand, and you either make a boulder, a piece of paper, or a pair of shears. Right? And we do it on three.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: To be perfectly honest, I'm not entirely sure what's happening either.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You've never played Boulder, Paper, Shears?! (all laugh)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's the best thing you've ever said, Marisha.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It burns. That is not pleasant.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Of course I've played Boulder, Paper, Shears.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Great, great. It's just to see who goes first. Ready?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And on the third one, I cast enlarge with the Titanstone Knuckles,

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pommel side, pommel side! I'm gonna Kynan him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, and you're going after Doty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, both you guys roll attack.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Boulder, Paper, Shears-- Boulder, Parchment, Shears.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why do you want a natural 20?! You're going to kill him!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not with the pommel side, man!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go ahead and do your sneak attack damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You, go ahead and roll for the backhand, it's one--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's just a backhand. I would say it's one damage plus your strength modifier.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Vax, where'd you get that amazing armor?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Doty is going to use his reaction to attack Vax.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Right? Because when attacked within five feet of me, he gets to react?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To defend me? Or to attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To attack the person who attacked you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: See, this is a real good way to figure shit out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is true! This is smart.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so after-- Okay, so you do seven damage, you backhand Doty (impact sound)--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The tome falls to the ground, open on the ground so the pages fold a little bit, and the metallic creature (shifting metal) back to you, stands up, and now goes a full six inches taller than you, and then rears back with its fist, and right as it's about to swing, it sees from behind Vax creep up and hit-- how much damage?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Plus I'm enlarged, so I am probably taller than Doty now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, that's right, yeah, so even at your enlarged height, you're still probably a good foot and a half, two feet larger than Doty.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's say I hit him, he looks back, and he's looking at my nipples.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, there you go. As you're growing (robotic motion noises)--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Goes to punch towards you, however out of the corner of Doty's eye, sees this half-elf show up and whack him right square in the center of the neck and spinal column and then the fist just goes wide and slams toward you. That is going to be a 23 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You suffer... Ooh! 16 points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the giant iron fist of Doty just (whack) clangs into the back of your head and part of your ear and you feel the ringing in your skull from the impact.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You, Taryon, fall to your knees--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- and find a large portion of your vitality and breath and just general awareness knocked out of you from from one singular blow from nowhere. Your eyes go white for a second--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is the sound that I make. (high pitched goat-like yelps) (all laugh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh yeah. Just so you're aware, everyone who's watching, you just watched your boyfriend cold-cock an innocent person.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I watched him walk up behind him and do it. I knew what he was doing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, just so you're aware. All right guys--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello everyone and welcome back to Critical Role. So, last we left off, in the middle of the Whitestone courtyard, two members of Vox Machina decided, as part of the hazing process, to assault our new temporary party member.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughs) When you put it like that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is literally the third time we have done this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's just-- Oh no, I am surprised, I wasn't expecting it, but it makes sense.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wow, it sounds like us last week.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That being the case, anyone who cares to get involved in this, I need you to roll initiative.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, you guys are all doing this to me?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I want to be in initiative just to make sure that I can actually make sure that--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Would you have gone with him, or would you have stayed back?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I was coming from talking to Jarrett so, it's up to you if I'm there yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So yeah, you wouldn't be there actually, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Am I walking up as it's happening?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You will be walking up towards the castle.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, this was a Tweedledee and Tweedledum.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: -- Grog whispering to Vax thing, on a walk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So. There is no Percival, no Keyleth in, but you guys were--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Percival's in, yeah, they're there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm just saying. It wasn't an announced thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What have we got? So we have...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, Percival, you're up first. As you watch Grog backhand this mechanical entity in the face, while Vax appears from the shadows and just beans the back of Taryon across the center of the neck and spinal column--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- and he falls to his knee making this horrible, horrible sound.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Come on man, pick it up, pick it up! I just draw my sword and stand on the sidelines, preparing for whatever is about to happen.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did Doty go down or-- no, he just stood there looking at me afterwards, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Doty just (twang), and looked back at you slowly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right here, about five feet from you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I hold up my hand and say: Show me what you have learned (all laugh)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, first and foremost I'm going to create a windwall, around us, like an arena.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Suddenly, the wind kicks up around (heavy wind). The leaves and various fallen parts of the greenery around here kick up into this torrent around you, as the wind is now creating a barrier around the battlefield.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I turn to Percy and I say: man, you know, I almost feel bad for the guy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Should I give him a boost?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Should we give him an incentive?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I give him a healing word.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We'll give him a level two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Level two, all right. 2d4 plus six.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I guess you're worth it. Oh, you got real lucky Tary. I got a four and a three, which adds to be seven. Plus...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus six for your Wisdom, so it's 13.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 13 points. And then I say: come on, Tary!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (high-pitched) What? Who said that? Why is the wind blowing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vax, what are you doing? (all laugh)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you sure? And then use Disengage to roll back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. And you move back away from him?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, but I have my movement plus-- Yes, back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Taryon. What do you wish to do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did 88 damage to him from behind with the back of your dagger. There is blood out of his nose, out of his ears.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If I'm not a master assassin--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How can I not go (thu-kunk) and not--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You at least split his head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Understand, you critically hit him from behind to do 88 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That would have killed a regular human being.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Or at least have put them in a-- He's not like, bleeding out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did I make it clear that I was trying to do this to Sam and not Tary? (all laugh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. Sam, what are you doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I-- I, shit, well Grog gets an attack, but I'm going to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, Grog is not directly in a melee with you, so Grog does not.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I'm going to counter clockwise around Doty, all the way round.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All the way around to here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I will cast Prismatic Spray.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need you all to make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do, because of your cloak.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a-- What saving throw? I'm so sorry.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: LIAM & MARISHA: Show me what you got!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to use my reaction to swallow part of the spell, so I'm going to take half damage of his half damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, got you. I'm going to go ahead and do this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can you do the chargey thing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can use this as long as I have a reaction.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I roll? Do you roll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, I did roll for that one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm gonna figure that out here in just a minute.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If you've vaporized me, I'm going to be real pissed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is 41 points of poison damage to you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And your charges are still full, regardless.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The front of your hair blown back from the blast of the heat. Percival, you feel the sickly ray of the poison splatter past and cover your skin with this semi-translucent poisonous liquid. Grog, you take 41 points of cold damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have resistance, with my new exalted knuckles.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do. So, you take 20 points of cold damage from that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, the beam subsides and you see them all blasted with it, but they're still standing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How are they still alive? (all laugh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And Doty's at the ready, (metal hitting metal) What do you want Doty to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, first of all, as my bonus action, I will cast Sanctuary on myself.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a new one right? We haven't come up against that before.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so Sanctuary on you, and what do you want to tell Doty to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Doty, I will say, (gasping for breath) Doty, save me... Save me! Hit the big guy!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is going to be a 17 to hit. What's your AC?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that hits. And then, after the fist comes back and smacks you in the face, across the jaw, for nine plus five-- 14 points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You feel the nose kinda (cracking noise) from the break, and the blood getting gushed from your nostrils. From the headbutt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Next up, top of the round, Percival.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, that Prismatic Spray was impressive.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know. I think I'm just gonna enjoy watching this for a minute.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm gonna hold my attack. Until he pulls out another object. Of any kind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you're holding until he fiddles with an object.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That brings it to Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right. That was a pretty good hit, and now I'm angry. And I rage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I walk up so I am within melee-- Actually, I'll go opposite... yeah, on the other side of Tary from Doty.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't attack of opportunity, do I?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, no, I wanna be on Tary, opposite of--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You weren't in combat with him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, no, I wanna be-- I wanna put Tary between me and the big robot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh I see. So you go this way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Great. I will say Doty does get an attack of opportunity on you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (whoosh) Just too slow, and too wide as the rage kinda instills you with adrenaline, and you dodge past.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And as I look down, dribbling out of my mouth, I say, Is that it? And that's my turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What? You're not gonna kill me?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (sighs) Should I make this more interesting? What haven't we tested yet? We haven't really seen him dodge yet, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we should see him dodge.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: See how well he can dodge. And I throw a Fireball. (explosion)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't wanna mess up Grog. Just Tary and Doty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I got-- oh, Sanctuary. Against spells? Even though this is an AOE?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Any attack or spell that targets the warded creature with an attack, so yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so yeah. Go ahead and roll your Fireball damage. Tary, I'm gonna need you to make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ow, jeez, oh my God. There's like-- There was like a little twinge.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You should have Vax work that out, later.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think I was-- No, it's this guy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, that's not gonna go well.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, you should get someone to work on that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go ahead and roll damage if you don't mind, Keyleth.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh my God, he is hanging on by a thread.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, where's my-- Who stole my book?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But I need it more than you, you get nothing!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I need to know what Fireball does.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I got it. One-- one, two...

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where am I on my walk up? Can I hear this going on?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear the distant-- As you're walking up towards the front of the castle, you see, suddenly, this blast of multicolored arcane energy just, (shhhh) out from over the castle wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You start running. Through the castle?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As fast as I can get there-- The way I know to get there the--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Would it be faster to go up-- Broom up and over? Into the courtyard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It'll still take you a couple rounds to get there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And as you begin to crest up you see a fiery explosion in the middle of the courtyard, now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I make sure I take off my hat.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 34 damage. So he did not dodge, though, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, so it's 34 points of fire damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's the elf boy. This is what we do, this is what we're gonna be facing, all right? Guys, we're fine, we're fine, that's enough.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're about to go to hell with someone who did not deal fairly with me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Several of us have already died.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And as you come up over the outside perimeter wall of castle Whitestone, you watch as the wind that is whipping around slowly subsides, and there in the center of the courtyard, you see the rest of your friends encircling Taryon Darrington, who is currently on one knee almost, and looks a little worse for wear.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can come along, and buddy, let me tell you something, if we get in the middle of the shit, I will protect you, but it is going to be rough. And they're not going to call off their attack like we are. Are you sure you want to write this book and come with us?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I cannonball Trinket into the middle of it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. In the middle of this conversation, you watch, out of the corner of your eye, Taryon--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not at Taryon, at my party.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know, but he looks over, because they're all facing him, and he looks up and sees you arcing over the top of the wall, and suddenly there's a flash of dark energy and a large bear, an armored bear, rolls out and just breaks into the center of everyone here as Taryon's pulling back, and now roars.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What the fuck is happening? I step away for five seconds and everybody's at war.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Isn't that right, Tary? Isn't this great?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm not a real adventurer. That was a story I told you. I know it was very convincing, but I haven't been on any real adventures, ever, and--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We knew that as soon as you said you wanted to rescue a damsel.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know that you thought that I was an adventurer.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know that you all look at me and you just see the armor and the handsomeness--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And you think, he has it all.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He has everything that we want. But it's a lie. It's a ruse.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And Trinket is still holding this aggressive stance to the rest of you, just in the vicinity, and looks a little more confused and just sits down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I think we're fine here, Trinket.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You notice we tend to make a lot of people cry?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We make a lot of people cry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We thought we would just give him a little taste of where he's going to make sure that he was up to it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We told him we were gonna go see Hotis and defeat him in the Nine Hells, and we wanted to make sure he lived.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We couldn't have this happen in the Nine Hells.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's no crying in the Nine Hells.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The worst place in all the multiverse, and we're gonna let him smack into that for his first time?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I... can I be real with you guys?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Daddy issues, that's all we had to hear.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I need to, I need to.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I kneel in front of him and I start massaging where I fucking beaned him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, careful there, it'll leave a bruise.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, no, I have very deft fingers.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Honestly, if you would've led with daddy issues, we probably would've trusted you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We would've just taken you right on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He doesn't like me, and he doesn't like the books I read, and he doesn't like that I like fantasy novels, and he doesn't like anything about me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know how I feel about this very dark mirror right now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I take him into a gentle headlock and I turn to my sister and say, Ahh, this guy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I raise my hands above my head.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait, what are you doing, what are you doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We can't beat him over the head after that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket's head pokes just into frame to you, Taryon, and he goes (licks)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No no no. He's my pet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That was terrible tough love, and I'm very sorry. I think you should come with us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You guys are so powerful and I'm not.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you know something? That fucking gaudy hat you're wearing? I would have no idea how to harness the power of that hat.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know shit about shit. All I know how to do is hit people in the back of the head, that's the one skill that I have. You know a lot more than I do. All you lack is experience.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but I really am a little worried he's gonna die in the Nine Hells.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I'm worried that we're all going to die in the Nine Hells.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Isn't there somewhere a little less scary we can take him?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, there's other stuff we need to do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I guess we could go ahead and head to the Water Ashari. It should be fairly calm.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Tary, have you ever passed out from drinking too much?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, I like him! Damn it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We had to beat him to a bloody pulp before we liked him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Look, we're all fuck-ups. We like people who show their vulnerabilities.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Now you're using it too many times.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's get you a beer. Would you like a beer?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Would you like a glass of wine?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Some of it is quite good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because the stuff we had in Ank'harel was really gross. I didn't wanna say anything, but--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, we know it was gross.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sometimes we must sacrifice for the adventure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you have any wine in your bag of holding?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, I just want to taste his wine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Has Dotty been in any fights, or--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You are the worst person, I love you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Doty, no! Why? Just pause for now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, but seriously, was he your nanny? It's okay if he was. I just want to know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We like fuck-ups. We're a family of fuck-ups, so, you want in or not?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because he listens to me, and understands me, and at night, when I play my characters, he plays with me. I play combat, and I pretend to be some of the characters I've read about, and he pretends to be the others.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, that's really wonderful. So you want to be an actor.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I want to be a hero. And I just haven't had the chance yet because my father says that I should just be focused on taking over the family business, learning financial things. And learning how to shake down a customer, and I'm so much more than that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There are other ways of being a hero than being an adventurer. There are a lot of ways you could be a hero.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. People who spend a lot of their earnings and people who are more privileged, like you, who help people in less privileged places.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There are many ways to help people in need.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do they write books about philanthropists?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A lot of times they do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But the stories I've read of adventure and derring-do and bravery--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I promise you, none of their dads leave the adventurers' money to their daughters, it's always to the sons.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know what I mean, you fucking third-grade assholes, jeepers creepers.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He could have me or any of you killed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We'll see. The other thing is, you've done the impossible.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I've taken a shine to you for some reason. Do you wanna shake off the child's play and do the real thing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You just live with it. So that feeling you're feeling? You're not gonna lose that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. But how will I survive in battle?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Healing potions, people who look out for each other.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This guys absorbs damage, so stick by him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't get up in the fray.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's through my antlers, so respect the antlers.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I do. I do. They look very powerful.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Something about your eyes make me feel ashamed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, shit. That is a new one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can we get this guy drunk, please.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're getting into shame and we're sober, I think something must be done about this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We got him so close to the brink, right? Shouldn't we just introduce him to the deep end so he can say he's been there, and then we bring him up?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, no, really, there's something to be said for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why don't we do it with wine?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We could do a little roleplay exercise, like in your stories.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's time we had another nerd.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But, if you want, we can make pretend and do a little thought exercise, and I'll pretend to be in distress and you can rescue me if that'll make you feel better.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah yeah yeah, he just has to vanquish me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, but you have to vanquish Grog.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, let's go get drunk, then.

lines.name: LIAM
